item.description:
this is my first meeting since taking over the group so i would just like to get everyone together for a bit of a social gathering and talk about where people want to see the group go and accomplish as well as going over questions that anyone has.

p.s. i literally live on a cliff and can see 5 towns from my kitchen window so definitely bring your camera and feel free to show up a bit early to take some pics. here is a picture from my backyard this last winter
http://dovaka.net/hos...
item.how_to_find_us: its the house on the left on top of the hill at the culdesac
item.name: My first meeting as the organizer
